description: The mail account request object for update.

ExecFetch.description: ACTION TRIGGER (non-persistent attribute)! If set to 1 all emails will be fetched.

IMAPFolder.description: The IMAP folder to use if type is 'IMAP'.

QueueID.description: The ID of the queue to dispatch to if DispatchingBy is 'Queue'.

Trusted.description: If set to 1 the KIX-X-Headers will be interpreted.

Type.description: One of the available types from resource /system/communication/mailaccounts/types.
